benefits.benefit1.description.value: Built on open internet protocols, there is no platform that can ban or censor you. You are in control of your data & speech

benefits.benefit2.description.value: Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away, and truly own your account — Thanks to advanced cryptography

benefits.benefit3.description.value: Traditional social media keeps you addicted in order to sell you ads, which is intoxicating society. Damus doesn't. The result? A healthier community

benefits.benefit4.description.value: Tip your friends, earn tips, support creators, and stack sats with Bitcoin & Lightning, the Free and open internet money

benefits.description.value: Damus is built on Nostr, a decentralized and open social network protocol. Without ads, toxic algorithms, or censorship, Damus gives you access to the social network that a truly free and healthy society needs — and deserves.

benefits.subheadline.value: With Damus, you are in control.

contribute.subheadline.value: Be part of the most popular Nostr client, start collaborating with an amazing team of developers, designers, product owners and more. Join us in our mission to make social media more healthy and free!

- Zaps
- DMs
- Reposts
- Likes/reactions
- Embedded video
- Upload media

- Search, and many more

faq.purple.effect.value: How does my purple membership affect notedeck?

faq.purple.effect.a.value: You get access to notedeck before anyone else!

faq.start.value: How do I get started (private key, public key)?

faq.start.a.value:
**From iOS Damus:** `Go to side menu` -> `Tap on profile` -> Tap on the *Copy button* adjacent to npub field

**Any public key:** Go to [nostr.band](https://nostr.band) in your browser, and search for a nostr user of interest (e.g. Terry Yiu) to find their npub (public key). Tap on npub to copy it.

![Npub example](/notedeck/npub_example.png)

**Private key:** From iOS Damus -> go to side menu -> settings -> keys -> copy "secret account login key" and use this to log in to notedeck.

faq.support.signer.extension.a.value: No. Notedeck is a desktop app where key storage is local so a signer extension isn't required. Trust in third party apps is eliminated by using the desktop app Notedeck.

faq.supported.os.a.value:
**On day one:**

- Linux
- Ubuntu
- Fedora
- MacOS
- Windows

**In the future:**
- Android
- iOS
- iPadOS

faq.trouble.feedback.a.value: Tag damus on nostr, or send an email to [support@damus.io](mailto:support@damus.io).

final_cta.subheadline.value:
Damus is available on iOS, iPadOS and macOS (M1/M2).
It's free and open source.

home.hero.subheadline.value:
Your very own social network for your friends or business.
 Available Now on iOS, iPad and macOS (M1/M2)

home.meta_description.value: Damus is a new social network that you control. Available now on iOS, iPad and macOS (M1/M2)

notedeck.benefits.benefit1.description.value: Access your account directly with your private key for enhanced security and privacy

notedeck.benefits.benefit2.description.value: Login with any public key for a read-only view of any nostr account

notedeck.benefits.benefit3.description.value: Easily manage multiple accounts. Great for quickly switching between work and personal accounts

notedeck.benefits.benefit4.description.value: Add columns to view profiles, hashtags, and notifications at a glance

notedeck.benefits.benefit5.description.value: Create posts, reply to others, and quote notes to engage with the nostr community

notedeck.benefits.benefit6.description.value: Easily log out of your account whenever needed for privacy

notedeck.benefits.description.value: These are currently the features you will receive immediately when you subscribe to Damus Purple

notedeck.benefits.headline.value: What’s included in Notedeck Alpha with your Damus Purple subscription?

notedeck.feature.availability.descriptio.value: Nostriches can also switch between multiple accounts quickly and easily, drastically improving personal and business use cases

notedeck.feature.customization.descripti.value: Add profile, hashtag, and notification columns of any nostr public or private key. Which means you can see the nostr landscape through other peoples' eyes

notedeck.feature.speed.description.value: The fastest nostr client. Built from the ground up with an ultra-fast database made exclusively for nostr, leveraging several state-of-the-art performance techniques not available on web clients

notedeck.feedback.subheadline.value: We encourage you to send feedback to our Damus npub over nostr or Github to we can take it in consideration in our Roadmap

notedeck.hero.announcement.value: Notedeck Alpha now available on Purple

notedeck.hero.description.value: Damus. Everywhere. The fastest native, customizable nostr experience, for all platforms.

notedeck.hero.headline.value: Damus. Everywhere. The fastest native, customizable nostr experience, for all platforms.

notedeck.meta_description.value: Notedeck is a powerful, performant Nostr client for Linux, Windows, and macOS

notedeck.not-included.description.value: We are working very hard to get these features out as soon as possible. If you want to collaborate please check out our [GitHub](https://github.com/damus-io/notedeck/issues)

notedeck.not-included.feature1.descripti.value: Tip creators and friends on nostr, or get tips for posting content

notedeck.not-included.feature3.descripti.value: View videos directly from your feed

notedeck.not-included.feature4.descripti.value: React to posts from your friends

notedeck.not-included.feature5.descripti.value: Easily search for content on your feed or around the nostr network, and get suggestions when tagging users

notedeck.not-included.feature6.descripti.value: Attach images or videos to your posts

notedeck.not-included.headline.value: What's NOT included so far, but we are building right now

notedeck.recap.description.value: Damus Notedeck is a lightning fast native app that allows you to explore the nostr social network in a completely new way, with several power features. **Try it today** with our [Purple](/purple) subscription

notedeck.waitlist.subheadline.value: Sign up for our waitlist and be the first to know when notedeck is ready

notedeck.what-is.description1.value: **Nostr is the future of social media** and Notedeck is our latest innovation towards the **future of nostr**.

notedeck.what-is.description2.value: A **lightning fast native app** that allows you to explore the nostr social network in a **completely new way**! Notedeck includes several power features to both personal and business use cases, including:

notedeck.what-is.description3.value:
This isn't a web app and it's not just "another" social client. This is nostr **like you've never seen it before!**

Notedeck works on **Linux**, **macOS**, and **Windows** on day one. An Android version will be added in 2025, along with iOS and iPadOS eventually.

Future nostr apps **will run on Notedeck in 2025.**

An early Notedeck Alpha version is available **today** to our paid [Purple](/purple) subscribers.

purple.benefits.benefit1.description.value: Support Damus development to help build the future of decentralized communication on the web.

purple.benefits.benefit2.description.value: Be the first to access upcoming premium features: Automatic translations, longer note storage, and more

purple.benefits.benefit3.description.value: Get a special badge on your profile to show everyone your contribution to Freedom tech

purple.benefits.description.value: Help us stay independent in our mission for Freedom tech with our Purple membership, and look cool doing it!

purple.checkout-maintenance.description-.value: We are working on some fixes, please come back later. Thank you for your patience.

purple.checkout.description-2.value: Use this page to purchase a new account, or to renew an existing one.

purple.faq.1.a.value: Yes! You can pay with Lightning if you register on the website. For the iOS app, you can pay with Apple Pay.

purple.faq.2.a.value: Unfortunately not. Apple doesn’t allow apps to accept Lightning payments. but you can register on the website and pay with Lightning there.

purple.faq.2.q.value: Can I pay with lightning via the app?

purple.faq.3.a.value: Damus Purple is a paid membership to Damus that gives you access to exclusive features, and helps us fund the project

purple.faq.4.a.value: Currently we offer automatic translations of posts. We are working to add more features as soon as possible.

purple.faq.5.a.value: Please see the section below for pricing.

purple.faq.6.a.value: Yes! You can pay with fiat if you register on the iOS app, via Apple Pay.

purple.faq.7.a.value: Sorry, we do not accept any cryptographic currencies other than Bitcoin via Lightning network.

purple.faq.8.a.value: Yes! You can donate to Damus via the Lightning network. Please click on 'Zap us' on the top menu.

purple.faq.8.q.value: Can I simply donate to Damus?

purple.faq.9.a.value:
Currently we support Arabic*, Bulgarian, Chinese*, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English*, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian*, Polish, Portuguese*, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, and Ukrainian.

 * Limitations apply

purple.login.description.value: Use this page to access your Purple account details

purple.login.login-successful.value: Login successful. You should be automatically redirected. If not, please click the button below.

purple.login.npub-label.value: Please enter your public key (npub) below

purple.login.otp-invalid.value: Invalid or expired OTP. Please try again.

purple.login.otp-sent.value:
We sent you a code via a Nostr direct message.
 Please enter it below

purple.login.stay-safe.message.value: We will never ask you for your nsec or any other sensitive information via Nostr DMs. Beware of impersonators. Please do not share your OTP code with anyone.

purple.otp.troubleshooting.message.value: If you don't see the OTP code, try the following steps:

purple.otp.troubleshooting.step1.value: Check your DM request tab (if you are on Damus)

purple.otp.troubleshooting.step2.value: Ensure your Nostr client is connected to our relay listed below:
